just use red for the two yellow stripes abbreviations sts stitches round round k knit p purl sl slip bor beginning of round pm place marker sm slip marker k2tog knit two stitches together p2tog purl circumference around ball of your foot measuring ~7 8 9 10 tips for clean stripes to avoid jogs knit one full round in the new color on the first stitch of the second round pick up the right leg of the stitch directly below it should be in the previous color and put it on your left needle then knit the first stitch of the round together with the stitch you just lifted to avoid the purl bump when switching colors for stripes in ribbing as this pattern does repeatedly knit the first round of a new color in plain stockinette then return to your ribbing pattern for the rest of the stripe tldr
